title: Frigid Blade
content:
Baldur's Gate 3. Frigid Blade gives you a chance to inflict Frostbite on targets. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.

Frigid Blade Information

You add your Proficiency Bonus as Cold damage. When the attack hits, apply Frostbite. The creature takes 1-4 Cold Damage when making a weapon attack.

3 turns Type: Weapon Action Range: 1.5m Mel
